case_title: MALIK MEHBOOB AND OTHERS vs BACHA GUL

facts.incident_details: Raid on complainant's Killi, theft of 60 sheep, pursuit by complainant's brother Samundar and others, resulting in firing by accused, death of Samandar, injuries to Nazar Gal and Maroof.
facts.investigation: Conducted by Tahsildar Chaman. Injured admitted to Civil Hospital Gulistan, later transferred to Civil Hospital Quetta.
facts.accused_movement: Accused fled to Afghanistan and returned after permission from authorities.

convictions.sentence: 10 years' R.I. each, fine of Rs. 2,000 each or 2 years' R.I. in default; 5 years' R.I. each, fine of Rs. 1,000 each or 1 year's R.I. in default.
5 years' R.I. each, fine of Rs. 1,000 each or 1 year's R.I. in default.

enhanced_sentences.sentence: 14 years' R.I. each, fine of Rs. 2,000 each or 2 years' R.I. in default.

grounds: Incident occurred in Afghanistan, questioning jurisdiction.
Accused not given full opportunity for defense.
Tribunal member Arbab Muhammad Umar Kansi did not attend sessions but submitted verdict separately.

findings.defense_opportunity: Accused submitted list of defense witnesses; some were examined, others dropped by accused.
findings.tribunal_member: Non-participation did not affect validity of verdict.
